Name: It's Dark
About the game: It's Dark is an asymmetrical multiplayer (3 vs 1) survival horror game that takes place in a lab on lockdown. One player plays as the monster, who must track and kill the other players to escape the lab. Up to three other players can play as scientists, who are tasked with exploring the lab and finding a way to subdue the monster. Features: -The Lab is procedurally generated so each game will be completely unique. -Making noise creates a notification ping that can alert players to your position. You'll need to be conscious of the noise you make in-game if you don't want to get discovered. -The dark environment makes for some tense gameplay. You'll never know what might around the corner...
Developers: Connor Redwine,James Martin,Cynthia Sisu'n,Alyssa Jackson,Jonathan Byrne
